resource.chars:
<u>24<sup>th</sup> May 1860</u>

My dear Sir

A cursory inspection of
Mr. Maxwells "postscript", which is
all the state of my health permits
me to bestow upon it leaves no
doubt upon my mind as to the
desirableness of its publication in
the Philosophical Transactions.
I would strongly recommend its 
publication

very sincerely yours
John <u>Tyndall</u>
